findings.title: Signature verification doesn't validate signer recovery
findings.description: ecrecover can return address(0) for invalid signatures. The code doesn't check for this case - if guardians[address(0)] were somehow true or the check is bypassed, invalid signatures pass.
findings.impact: Forged guardian approvals allow minting tokens without real deposits.
findings.recommendation: require(signer != address(0)) after ecrecover. Validate signature format. Use OpenZeppelin ECDSA library.

findings.title: No deduplication of signers
findings.description: The same guardian signature could potentially be counted multiple times if included multiple times in the signatures array.
findings.recommendation: Track which guardians have already signed. Require ordered signatures to prevent duplicates.
